title: [Large-Scale] Visualization Strategy Design for Language Learning Using Infographics

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and basic understanding of linguistic structures
context.additional_context: Learners interact in a VR environment to experience the visualization process of language learning content. They conduct step-by-step infographic creation exercises using digital devices (tablets/headsets).

learning_goals: Learners can design an infographic storyboard by extracting key information from language learning topics.
Learners can create infographics with three or more levels of visual hierarchy using VR simulation tools.
Learners can improve the visual communication effectiveness of infographics by 20% or more by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
